item.title: Marius Gundersen
item.description: I want to share a bit about how the endpoint routing in asp.net can be made dynamic. I tried to look into this, but couldn't find any documentation and so decided that I had to write about it myself. I will use asp.net 6 in this article since I can then use the minimal apis and more easily fit everything into a single file, but the code shown here will work in asp.net 5 and will work with the classical Startup class too.
